title: Like a very Thick Copperplate font, but with less sharp Serifs
content:
It is the typeface used on the words 'This' and 'Dead' that I am trying to find a font similar to.  
If you can help it would be much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826032047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image002_3796.jpg)
author: Rawshock Design
